name: Sri Ponnambala Vanesar Kovil
description: A prominent Hindu temple in Colombo dedicated to Lord Dharam Rajah. Known for its colorful architecture and religious festivals.

name: Koneshar Temple
description: Ancient Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Murukan, located near the cliff top of Trincomalee.

name: Sri Mahapullari Kovil
description: A sacred Hindu temple in Mannar, known for its historical significance.

name: Muneshwaram Temple
description: One of the five sacred sites of Shiva in Sri Lanka, known as Nallur Kandaswamy.

name: Thirukoneswaram Temple
description: Ancient Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, situated on a hill overlooking the sea.

name: Naguleswaram Temple
description: Combined Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva and Lord Murugan, located on a coastal site.

name: Sri Kathiravelau Manikka Vinayagar Temple
description: Popular temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha with significant cultural importance.
